subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Sportswriters sang the praises of Tuukka Rask, Patrice Bergeron and Jaromir Jagr after the Bruins shut out the Blackhawks in Game 3 of the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: Sportswriters sang the praises of Tuukka Rask, Patrice Bergeron and Jaromir Jagr after the Bruins shut out the Blackhawks in Game 3 of the Stanley Cup finals.
